example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (VP (VA 合适))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 申请人))) (VP (ADVP (AD 将)) (VP (VSB (VV 获邀) (VV 参加)) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-4 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (VP (PP-TMP (P 於) (NP (NP (NT 明年)) (NP (NT 二月) (CC 或) (NT 三月)))) (VP (VV 举行)))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 最後)) (NP (NN 面试))))))
